post:
Greeting from **[Gigsgigscloud.com](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com)** Thank you for your support to GigsGigsCloud.com. With your kind support, we are growing faster than expected.

We takes this opportunity to announce that GigsGigscloud.com has officially launched Malaysia OpenVZ VPS. These VPS are hosted in Malaysia AIMS Data Center. Each packages are remain the same configuration as our Hong Kong OpenVZ VPS.

All the VPS will be soft limit to 10Mbps uplink, while host node will be connected to 100Mbps uplink and the price is still starting from $6. With launch of this node, we strongly believe that improve the accessibilities of overseas business that willing to tap into Asia Market. 

For more information about the package, please visit our website at http://www.gigsgigscloud.com

Again, your support to launch of our Hong Kong Node is highly appreciated. We striving our best to serve you better, and provide more and more node in the world.

**About GigsGigsCloud** 
GigsGigsCloud.com (operated by Techavenue International Ltd) is a service extension from GigsGigs.com (Techavenue Sdn Bhd) which operating the business since year 2004. Techavenue is one of the top 10 largest Hosting company in Malaysia, with stable of financial status, and own high technology of equipments for hosting industries. With more then 10 years of experience in Web Hosting Business, now creating an business focus that mainly target Cloud and VPS in global market.

GigsGigsCloud.com was built with the foundation of providing affordable, yet stable and reliable VPS and Cloud Hosting solution to the Hosting Industry. The founders of GigsGigsCloud.com have focused their skills and experience to develop custom, reliable and efficient, yet cost-effective hosting solution to the public.

**Package:**

    Cloudlet C1
    CPU: 1 Core
    Memory: 512M
    Storage: 10G SAS
    Data Transfer: 1TB
    TUN / TAP / PPP
    rDNS
    Price: USD 6.00 / Month

[ORDER HERE](https://clientarea.gigsgigscloud.com/index.php?/cart/cloudlets-basic/)

Hong Kong Download test: [100MB download file](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com/download/test.zip)
Looking glass: [http://lg.gigsgigscloud.com](http://lg.gigsgigscloud.com/)
